job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Technical Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on using and improving AI systems for customer support rather than developing or engineering them. While it involves interacting with AI models, the core responsibilities are centered around technical support and feedback, not core AI development or MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the process of adapting or adjusting machine learning models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category.
Improving an AI system implies making changes to its underlying models or logic, which is a form of modeling or model adaptation.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools, even if AI-related, involves software development practices to build and evaluate them.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing customer tickets and understanding the issues they represent is a core aspect of understanding the business context and customer needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This describes the application of technical knowledge to solve business problems (customer support) by integrating different capabilities.

technologies.justification: The job description repeatedly mentions 'AI systems' and 'AI model fine-tuning', indicating interaction with generative models.

soft_skills.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the need to solve problems where current AI solutions are insufficient.
This directly points to the ability to solve problems independently and overcome obstacles.

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month
soft_skills.justification: This indicates a requirement for rapid learning and adaptation to new products and systems.
Providing detailed feedback requires clear communication of observations and suggestions.

soft_skills.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
soft_skills.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools suggests an initiative-taking and innovative approach.
